org.jboss.gravia.runtime

Enum Module.State

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Module.State>
      • org.jboss.gravia.runtime.Module.State
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<Module.State>
    Enclosing interface:
    Module

    public static enum Module.State
extends Enum<Module.State>
    A module can be in one of six states:

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      ACTIVE
      The module is now running.
      INSTALLED
      A module is in the INSTALLED state when it has been installed in the Runtime
      RESOLVED
      The module is resolved and is able to be started.
      STARTING
      The module is in the process of starting.
      STOPPING
      The module is in the process of stopping.
      UNINSTALLED
      The module is uninstalled and may not be used.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • INSTALLED

        public static final Module.State INSTALLED
        A module is in the INSTALLED state when it has been installed in the Runtime

      • RESOLVED

        public static final Module.State RESOLVED
        The module is resolved and is able to be started.

      • STARTING

        public static final Module.State STARTING
        The module is in the process of starting.

        A module is in the STARTING state when its start method is active. A module must be in this state when the module's ModuleActivator.start(ModuleContext) is called. If the ModuleActivator.start(ModuleContext) method completes without exception, then the module has successfully started and must move to the ACTIVE state.

      • ACTIVE

        public static final Module.State ACTIVE
        The module is now running.

        A module is in the ACTIVE state when it has been successfully started and activated.

      • STOPPING

        public static final Module.State STOPPING
        The module is in the process of stopping.

        A module is in the STOPPING state when its stop method is active. A module must be in this state when the module's ModuleActivator.stop(ModuleContext) method is called. When the ModuleActivator.stop method completes the module is stopped and must move to the RESOLVED state.

      • UNINSTALLED

        public static final Module.State UNINSTALLED
        The module is uninstalled and may not be used.

        public static Module.State[] values()
        Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared. This method may be used to iterate over the constants as follows:

    System.out.println(c);

        an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared
